resources:
Yakshmaat Hello blank fragment • You are recognized as a legal rural healthcare provider by the government of India. • Incentive of Rs. 150 on every TB patient data by the RHCP and free medicines for the first 10 TB patients. • Receive diagnostic kits for TB skin test at subsidized rate. • Receive anti-TB FDC’s for TB at a subsidized rate. • Receive support from the government during an epidemic emergency in your area. Congratulations on becoming a certified Rural Health Care Provider (RHCP). Benefits of becoming a RHCP- Are you a certified RHCP? Become a certified legal rural healthcare provider (RHCP) by attending these free training programs to receive benefits from the government. You become a certified RHCP only upon completion of all these training programs. Submit Patient Data Training Certified RHCP Help About
//home Welcome to YAKSHMAAT, an anonymous TB reporting portal which connects Information Providers to the government for a better and effective TB treatment plan. Change Language 
														YAKSHMAAT
 An app based on eradication of Tuberculosis from India.
 Creators -
 Anika
 Shrushti
 Aneesh
 Hariharan

//rhcp Congratulations on becoming a certified Rural Health Care Provider (RHCP) • You are recognized as a legal rural healthcare provider by the government of India.
• Receive incentive of Rs. 150 on your every TB patient data input. 
• Receive free medicines for the first 10 valid patient data inputs.
• Receive diagnostic kits for TB skin test at subsidized rate.
• Receive anti-TB FDC’s for TB at a subsidized rate.
• Receive support from the government during an epidemic emergency in your area. Benefits of becoming a RHCP - RHCP Options RHCP Profile Info Patient History Orders Incentive Status
//help Help Section Contact National TB program - Helpline number of Yakshmaat - 9834046436
//submitpatient Choose how you want to enter data Report Anonymously Log In as RHCP
//training Free training on basics of human anatomy and physiology - happening in Katpadi on 19th December,2018.
 Free training on maternal and child health care - happening in Katpadi on 19th December,2018.
 Free training on medical diagnostics - happening in Katpadi on 19th December,2018.
 Free training on TB diagnosis, treatment - happening in Katpadi on 19th December,2018.
 Free training on HIV diagnosis treatment - happening in Katpadi on 19th December,2018.
 Free training on Swine flu diagnosis treatment - happening in Katpadi on 19th December,2018.
